notifications.title: Permission
notifications.prompt: Do you want to enable notifications? You'll receive real-time updates about things you care about.
notifications.WelcomePleaseVerifyEmail: Welcome! Please verify your email address.
notifications.ForgetPass: Hey, did you forget your passphrase?

login.title: Welcome

directions.GetStarted: Create an account, or log in.
directions.NoRegister: Log in if you have an account.
directions.WasInvited: What's the best way to reach you?

login.resendConfirm: Do you want to send a message to reset your passphrase?
login.resendSuccess: Check for a message to reset your passphrase
login.noPassphrase: Before you can log in, you must set a pass phrase by clicking the link in your activation message.
login.notVerified: You must send yourself an activation message in order to log in.
login.emailExists: Did you try to register with this email before? If so, check your inbox to activate your account. Click to re-send the message
login.mobileExists: Did you try to register with this mobile number before? If so, check your SMS to activate your account. Click to re-send the message
login.newUser: or create a new account below
login.facebookNoEmail: Your facebook account is missing a confirmed email address. Simply log in the native way.
login.picTooltip: You can change this picture later
